document_data.History: Sometime in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], [[Vernon Condor]], the Regent of the Exchequer in [[Ravens Bluff]], sent a secret message in ''moon writing'' to a group of Ravenian [[adventurer]]s he was hiring to retrieve the [[granite]] pedestal of ''[[The Menagerie]]'' as he was paranoid of interference from either the [[Red Wizards of Thay]] or the [[Zhentarim]].
